**Tender Announcement: Repair, Overhaul, and Rental Services for PT6T-9 Engine Series Components**

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029287
**Solicitation Number:** T8493-22-0059
**Publication Date:** March 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
Transport Canada's Aircraft Services Directorate is seeking a service provider to deliver repair, overhaul, advance exchange, mobile repair parties (MRP) services, and rental of PT6T-9 series engines, components, and accessories. This requirement is in support of Transport Canada's operational needs and is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Notice Type and Status:**
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Government Contracts Regulations. The tender is closed, and no further submissions will be accepted.

**Description of Services:**
The successful service provider will be responsible for providing the following services:

* Repair, overhaul, and advance exchange of PT6T-9 series engines, components, and accessories on an as-and-when-requested basis
* Mobile repair parties (MRP) services
* Rental of PT6T-9 series engines, components, and accessories

**Contract Period and Value:**
The proposed contract period is two years, from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025, with optional periods of 12 months each. The estimated value of the contract is $3,000,000.00 USD (taxes extra).

**Contact Information:**
Enquiries should be addressed to:
Tanya Nadeau
Telephone: 343-575-6684
Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**
The tender document packages are available for download from the [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.
